unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: P-value of a 1-sided Test Given t-test
question_text:
A significance test was performed to test ${ H }_{ 0 }:\mu =18$ versus the alternative ${ H }_{ a }:\mu > 18$. Data from a random sample of size $30$ makes a normal distribution and produces a test statistic of $t = 1.734$.
Which of the following intervals contains the P-value for this test?
